Brief description: Oceanographic and surface meteorological readings taken from a series of buoys positioned throughout the equatorial Pacific.
Preprocessing: 12 weather attributes are measured at each buoy.
Creator: Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory

Brief description: Time-series of greenhouse gas concentrations at 2921 grid cells in California created using simulations of the weather.
Creator: D. Lucas

Dataset Name: Atmospheric CO2 from Continuous Air Samples at Mauna Loa Observatory
Brief description: Continuous air samples in Hawaii, USA. 44 years of records.
Creator: Mauna Loa Observatory

Brief description: Radar data from the ionosphere. Task is to classify into good and bad radar returns.
Reference: Sigillito, Vincent G., et al. "Classification of radar returns from the ionosphere using neural networks." Johns Hopkins APL Technical Digest10.3 (1989): 262–266.
Creator: Johns Hopkins University

Preprocessing: Many features given, including weather conditions at time of measurement.
Reference: Zhang, Kun, and Wei Fan. "Forecasting skewed biased stochastic ozone days: analyses, solutions and beyond." Knowledge and Information Systems14.3 (2008): 299–326.Reich, Brian J., Montserrat Fuentes, and David B. Dunson. "Bayesian spatial quantile regression." Journal of the American Statistical Association (2012).
Creator: K. Zhang et al.
